name: videospeed-controller-beta
description: BETA testing release of Video Speed Controller. Speed up, slow down, advance and rewind HTML5 audio/video with shortcuts
author: Ilya Grigorik (https://github.com/igrigorik)

scripts.show-coverage: jest --coverage && echo npx web-ext --source-dir=%CD%\dist\chrome run -t chromium --start-url file:///%CD%/.nocommit/coverage/lcov-report/index.html --chromium-profile %CD%/.nocommit/profiles/chrome --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes | cmd
scripts.chrome: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome-dev && npm run launch:chrome
scripts.brave: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome-dev && npm run launch:brave
scripts.firefox: npm run clean && npm run build:firefox-dev && npm run launch:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./webpack/chrome.js
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./webpack/firefox.js
scripts.build:chrome-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./webpack/chrome.js
scripts.build:firefox-dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./webpack/firefox.js
scripts.launch:chrome: echo npx web-ext --source-dir=%CD%\dist\chrome run -t chromium --start-url file:///%CD%/test/assets/big_buck_bunny.mp4 --chromium-profile %CD%/.nocommit/profiles/chrome --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes | cmd
scripts.launch:brave: echo npx web-ext --source-dir=%CD%\dist\chrome run -t chromium --chromium-binary "C:\Program Files (x86)\BraveSoftware\Brave-Browser\Application\brave.exe" --start-url file:///%CD%/test/assets/big_buck_bunny.mp4 --chromium-profile %CD%/.nocommit/profiles/brave --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes | cmd
scripts.launch:firefox: echo npx web-ext --source-dir=%CD%\dist\firefox run -t firefox-desktop --start-url file:///%CD%/test/assets/big_buck_bunny.mp4 --firefox-profile %CD%/.nocommit/profiles/firefox --profile-create-if-missing --keep-profile-changes | cmd
